Class GamePhaseConfig

java.lang.Object
studio.devsavegg.game.GamePhaseConfig
public class GamePhaseConfig extends Object
Defines the configuration for a specific phase of the game (e.g., "The Flop").

# Principle - Open/Closed Principle (OCP): Encapsulates phase behavior data, allowing new game modes without changing engine logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePhaseConfig

      public GamePhaseConfig(String phaseName, int communityCardsToDeal, int holeCardsToDeal, boolean isBettingRound, boolean triggersShowdown, boolean isDrawRound)
      Constructs a new GamePhaseConfig.

      # Design - Data Transfer Object (DTO): Immutable configuration object.

      Parameters:
      phaseName - The display name of the phase.
      communityCardsToDeal - Number of community cards to deal.
      holeCardsToDeal - Number of hole cards to deal.
      isBettingRound - Whether a betting round occurs in this phase.
      triggersShowdown - Whether this phase triggers a showdown immediately.
      isDrawRound - Whether this phase allows drawing/discarding cards.
